page.title: 12A NINE-YEAR-OLD'S DAY
page.content: My name is Mari Hughes-Edwards. I am nine years old.I go to Goldsworth Middle School.I am in the 1st year. Mr. Clayton is my teacher.I like him. My home is St.Andrews Manse,Heathside Road.My father is the Minister at St. Andrews Church.My mother is a teacher. I have one brother named Rhisiart who is thirteen and attends a school in Guildford.I enjoy all my lessons.In my spare time I practise my piano,read books,play with my pet hamster,or play with my friends.Mrs.McDonald is the Headteacher of my school.It is a very happy school and I have many friends. This term the 1st Year went to Loseley Farm near Guildford.We all enjoyed it. At holiday times my family visits my grandmother who lives in Wales.This year we also spent a week in Norfolk and another week in Paris.
